name: DonateBloodbyAmericanRedCross
0:
”Alexa, ask red cross blood where can I donate blood”
”Alexa, ask red cross blood to schedule my donation appointment”
”Alexa, ask red cross blood to list my appointment”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: red cross blood
Developer Terms of Use
des:
• Use Alexa to find a convenient blood drive or blood donation center location based on your address, or where you have previously donated.
• Schedule, change or cancel an upcoming blood donation appointment.
• Receive voice reminders 1 and 3 days prior to an upcoming appointment.
• Issue voice notifications and alerts when there is a critical need for blood.
• Alexa can help prepare you for your donation by answering any questions you might have about the donation process or the general requirements for donating.
Note: New user authentication is needed. If trouble accessing the skill or your Red Cross account, you may need to relink your account.
